cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.models

Class Bid

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.models.Bid

  • public class Bid
extends java.lang.Object
    Bid is meant to represent a bid made by a User (called the bidder) on an Instrument.
    See Also:
    Instrument, User

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bid(java.lang.String instrument, java.lang.String owner, java.lang.String bidder, float bidAmount)
      Creates a new Bid from the supplied bidder on the supplied instrument
      Bid(java.lang.String instrument, java.lang.String owner, java.lang.String bidder, float bidAmount, java.lang.String id)
      Creates the Bid with the supplied id

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getAccepted()
      Returns whether the Bid has been accepted or not
      float getBidAmount()
      Returns the amount the Bid is for
      java.lang.String getBidderId()
      Returns the id of the User that made the Bid
      java.lang.String getId()
      Returns the id of the Bid
      java.lang.String getInstrumentId()
      Returns the id of the Instrument the bid is on
      java.lang.String getOwnerId()
      Returns the id of the User that owns the Instrument the bid is on
      void setAccepted()
      Sets the Bid to being accepted

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bid

        public Bid(java.lang.String instrument,
   java.lang.String owner,
   java.lang.String bidder,
   float bidAmount)
        Creates a new Bid from the supplied bidder on the supplied instrument
        Parameters:
        instrument - the instrument to make the bid on
        owner - the id of the user that owns the instrument
        bidder - the id of the user that is bidding on the instrument
        bidAmount - the amount to bid
        See Also:
        Instrument, User

        bidder - the id of the user that is bidding on the instrument
        bidAmount - the amount to bid
        id - the id of the bid
